channel.title: Making a prayer restore command [667]
channel.description:
yes iknow its not really needed but still...
[code=java] if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("prayer")) { final int maxPrayer = player.getSkills().getLevelForXp(Skills.PRAYER) * 10; player.getPrayer().restorePrayer(maxPrayer); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Your prayer has been recharged."); } [/code]
ok so now ill explain it a bit
[code=java]if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("prayer")) {[/code]
means: if u typ in ;;prayer in-game it will do this: [code=java]final int maxPrayer = player.getSkills().getLevelForXp(Skills.PRAYER) * 10;//the int for maxPrayer player.getPrayer().restorePrayer(maxPrayer);//makes it restore prayer[/code]
after its done, it will send u a message:
[code=java]player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Your prayer has been recharged.");[/code]
so yea this will kinda do this:
u typ in ;;prayer and it gives u 99 prayer points again
EDIT:
add import to commands.java
import com.rs.game.player.Prayer;
add it on the top along with the other imports
EDIT2:
btw i made this for PerfectionX and Project-Nex
Credits: 100% me

item.title: Making a prayer restore command [667]
item.dc:creator: @mickie456 mickie456
item.description:
@mickie456 wrote:

yes iknow its not really needed but stillâ€¦

			if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("prayer")) {
				final int maxPrayer = player.getSkills().getLevelForXp(Skills.PRAYER) * 10;
					player.getPrayer().restorePrayer(maxPrayer);
					player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Your prayer has been recharged.");
			}

ok so now ill explain it a bit

means: if u typ in ;;prayer in-game it will do this:

final int maxPrayer = player.getSkills().getLevelForXp(Skills.PRAYER) * 10;//the int for maxPrayer player.getPrayer().restorePrayer(maxPrayer);//makes it restore prayer

after its done, it will send u a message:

so yea this will kinda do this:

u typ in ;;prayer and it gives u 99 prayer points again

EDIT:

add import to commands.java

import com.rs.game.player.Prayer;

add it on the top along with the other imports
